structure.unit: ARTICLE XLIV. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY ADDICTION SERVICES BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-425. Reports.
Within the first ninety 90 days of each calendar year, the Board shall make a report or the Board of County Commissioners of the Board's activities for the preceding calendar year. Each such report shall set forth a complete operating and financial statement covering its operation during such year.
